TEI.2.document_title: Dr. John Sibley to Stephen F. Austin, 07-07-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 847

div1.p: I take pleasure with this to introduce to you Mr. Cherbonier with whom I have been long Acquainted, he is a gentleman who posseses the Esteem of all his Acquaintances, as a scholar, a man of Integrity and honour, and in every respect worthy of your notice.
[Addressed:] Honble Stephen F. Austin Esquire Brazos Mr Cherbonier.
